column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Izzy - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry you have had subpar service during your visits. If you come through again
column2: please ask for me or any of the floor managers who will ensure your experience is superior to what you have described. I did not fully understand the issue you have described
column3: but I did get the gist of your explanation
column4: so we will certainly discuss these aspects with our staff.
